name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScreenApp - Record and take AI notes of meetings, videos, calls & lectures

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily record your screen and audio with ScreenApp. Take AI Notes and summaries of any recording.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
